name: Cybersea - A MightyManateez RPG
description:
Cybersea is a top-down action RPG game where you play as Detective Manatee, PI, investigating the mysterious disappearance of Councilman Sea Snail. It is set in the underwater cyberpunk city of Neo Atlantis, where sea rise in the future has returned a futuristic human city to the ownership of sea creatures. The tone is a family-friendly, humor-driven pastiche of cyberpunk noir stories, with gameplay targeting a more accessible version of Hyper Light Drifter.

The gameplay focuses on exploration and combat, with light puzzle solving elements. 

Playable on Windows and Mac via the Solarus launcher, linked below.

The game is free to play for everyone in and outside of the Mighty Manateez Community!

Our Twitter:

https://twitter.com/MightyManateez

Controls:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Interaction / Dash - Space 
  • Menu - Esc / D 
  • Sword - C A
  • Aim - Z 
  • Fire - (while aiming) X, C 
  • Heal - (hold) V 
  • Swap Guns - G 
  • Throw Grenade - F

It should work fine with a gamepad/controller, but pause might be right bumper because of weird default mapping. Or it might not be! It seems like some controllers will work, and some won't. I haven't had any issues with the cheap USB controller I have.
